  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AuthController
    Controller responsible for handling user authentication and registration processes.
    GenreChallengeController
    Controller for the "Genre Challenge" quiz mode.
    ImageQuizController
    Controller handling the "Image Quiz" game mode (Guess the Game from an image).
    ImageQuizController.GuessRequest
    Represents a Data Transfer Object (DTO) used for carrying a user's guess and the expected correct answer (or key identifying it) during a game or quiz submission.
    ImageQuizController.GuessResponse
    DTO for sending simple boolean guess responses.
    LeaderboardController
    Controller responsible for managing and retrieving leaderboard data.
    MultiFactMixQuizController
    Controller for the "Multi-Fact Mix" quiz mode.
    NewReleasesController
    Controller for the "New Releases" quiz mode.
    PlatformMatchController
    Controller for the "Platform Match" quiz mode.
    RatingEstimatorQuizController
    Controller for the "Rating Estimator" quiz mode.
    ResultController
    Controller responsible for saving and retrieving user quiz results.
    RetroQuizController
    Controller for the "Retro Quiz" game mode.
    UserController
    Controller responsible for user profile management and identification.
